en: Jehovah is my shepherd; I shall not want.
hmr: LALPA chu ka ta dingin Berâmpu a nih, tlasam naw ningah.

en: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures; He leadeth me beside still waters.
hmr: Ama chun hlohna hring dup hmunah a mîn bawktir hlak a, Châwlna tui pangahai a mi ṭhuoi hlak.

en: He restoreth my soul: He guideth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake.
hmr: Ka hringna hi a mi siemtharpêk nâwk hlak a, Ama hming leiin felna lampuiahai a mi ṭhuoi hlak.

en: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil; for thou art with me; Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me.
hmr: Anih, thina hlim varuom hraw lang khawm, Thil ṭha naw hrim hrim ṭi naw ningah, nang ka kuomah i um sih a: I hembâwk le i hmawlin a mi thlamuon hlak a nih.

en: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: Thou hast anointed my head with oil; My cup runneth over.
hmr: A mi dotuhai mithmuah ka hmaa hin dawkân i buotsai hlak a, Ka lu hi hriek i nâl tah a, ka noa hin a liem zing a.

en: Surely goodness and lovingkindness shall follow me all the days of my life; And I shall dwell in the house of Jehovah for ever.
hmr: Matheiloin ṭhatna le ngilneinain ka dam sûng po po hin mi zui pei a ta: Chuongchun, LALPA inah kumkhuoin um zing ka tih.
